ValidationRule.description: Hardware Quote #(s) Per Platform field is required if "Solution Type" = Customization OR Pricing Only OR RFx Support OR Sell Through OR Other
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName='Request_OEM_Customized_Solution_Support', ISBLANK(Hardware_Quote_s_Platform_Names__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( OEM_Solution_Bundle__c , 'Customization'), ISPICKVAL( OEM_Solution_Bundle__c , 'Pricing Only'), ISPICKVAL( OEM_Solution_Bundle__c , 'RFx Support'), ISPICKVAL( OEM_Solution_Bundle__c , 'Sell Through'), ISPICKVAL( OEM_Solution_Bundle__c , 'Other')))
